text: Knuckles' Chaotix, simply called Chaotix in Japan, is a platform video game in the Sonic the Hedgehog series. It was made by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the Sega 32X in 1995. It is a spin-off that stars Knuckles the Echidna and a group of new characters instead of Sonic the Hedgehog. ==References== Category:1995 video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog spin-off games Category:Sega video games Category:Cooperative video games Category:Sega 32X games Category:Side-scrolling platform games Category:Video game spin-offs Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Knuckles' Chaotix
